file.fieldDescription: If Hero Background Image and Hero Background Video both are configured, the video will take priority and be shown on the slide.
file.name: ./slide1/file
file.title: Upload Image Asset

heroVideoBackground.fieldDescription: If Hero Background Image and Hero Background Video both are configured, the video will take priority and be shown on the slide.
heroVideoBackground.name: ./slide1/heroVideoBackground

hotspotVideoThumb.fieldDescription: This is mandatory for DAM/Assets videos
hotspotVideoThumb.name: ./hotspotVideoThumb

hotspotPositionX.fieldDescription: Minimum value: 1; Maximum value: 12; Center position: 6
hotspotPositionX.name: ./hotspotPositionX

hotspotPositionY.fieldDescription: Minimum value: 1; Maximum value: 10; Center position: 5
hotspotPositionY.name: ./hotspotPositionY

targetType.fieldDescription: ​Select whether the URL should open in the same tab or a new tab.
targetType.name: ./linkBehaviour

ctaOverlayVideoThumb.fieldDescription: This is mandatory for DAM/Assets videos
ctaOverlayVideoThumb.name: ./ctaOverlayVideoThumb
